references: Related: CF 195366, CF 201427, CF 203209. Amending: Ord 48022
summary: An ordinance relating to the operation of steam engines and steam boilers and the licenses and license fees required therefor, and amending Sections 131, 133, 134, 135, 136, 137, 138, 140, 141, 142, 143, 144 and 145 of the License Code to differentiate between Engineers' and Firemen's licenses therefor, and to cover electric powered boilers.
